org.lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator

Interface AbstractHardwareListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CardSlotListener, CoinRackListener, CoinReceptacleListener, CoinSlotListener, DeliveryChuteListener, DisplaySimulatorListener, IndicatorLightSimulatorListener, LockSimulatorListener, PopCanRackListener, PushButtonCodeInterpreterListener, PushButtonSimulatorListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PushButtonCodeInterpreter

    public interface AbstractHardwareListener
    This class represents the abstract interface for all hardware listeners. All subclasses should add their own event notification methods, the first parameter of which should always be the instance affected.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disabled(AbstractHardware<AbstractHardwareListener> hardware)
      Announces that the indicated hardware has been disabled.
      void enabled(AbstractHardware<AbstractHardwareListener> hardware)
      Announces that the indicated hardware has been enabled.
